curriculum.title: Curriculum & Roadmap
curriculum.subtitle: Clear, modular curriculum. Each module has short practical exercises and a real-time practice session.
curriculum.skill1: Card handling, shuffling, and pitch techniques

curriculum.timelineDesc: Most students reach job-ready proficiency in 6-12 weeks with consistent practice
curriculum.module1Copy: Rules and payouts for blackjack, roulette and poker. Table equipment, basic chip handling and clean dealing drills.
curriculum.module1Outcomes: Deal clean hands, recognize table mistakes, basic math checks.
curriculum.module2Copy: Insurance, blackjack payouts, splitting and doubling rules. Dealer-specific protocols and error handling.
curriculum.module2Outcomes: Deal, manage insurance, spot payout edge-cases.
curriculum.module3Copy: Payout tables, wheel calls, bet types, tracking visual indicators. Handling disputes and lost chips.
curriculum.module3Outcomes: Perform correct payouts and run efficient wheel cycles.
curriculum.module4Copy: Collecting antes, managing pots, proper chip moves, common fouls and dealer wording.
curriculum.module4Outcomes: Run a clean poker round under pressure.
curriculum.module5Copy: Camera framing, audio, basic streaming software, latency handling, and player-facing overlays.
curriculum.module5Outcomes: Set up a professional live-dealer stream or assist one.
curriculum.module6Copy: Player psychology, floor etiquette, building a CV, where to look for roles, interview prep.
curriculum.module6Outcomes: Present yourself professionally and land interviews.
curriculum.module7Copy: Final practical session with live simulated shifts and instructor feedback.
curriculum.module7Outcomes: Demonstrate readiness to work a live or online table.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At LearnToDeal, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.
privacy.section1Content: We collect information you provide when you contact us through our forms, including your name, email address, phone number (optional), timezone, and any messages you send. We also collect basic usage data through our website analytics.
privacy.section2Content: We use your information to respond to your inquiries, schedule coaching sessions, send course materials, and improve our services. We never sell your personal information to third parties.
privacy.section3Content: Your data is stored securely using industry-standard encryption. We use Google Sheets for contact management and Telegram for internal notifications. Both services comply with GDPR standards.
privacy.section4Content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data at any time. You can also opt out of marketing communications. To exercise these rights, contact us directly.
privacy.section5Content: We use minimal cookies necessary for website functionality. We do not use tracking cookies or third-party advertising cookies.
privacy.section6Content: If you have questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your data, please contact us through our contact form or email.

terms.title: Terms of Service

terms.section1Content: LearnToDeal offers professional casino dealer training through one-on-one sessions, small group classes, and mentor check-ins. All sessions are conducted online via Zoom or similar platforms.
terms.section2Content: Payment is required before scheduled sessions. We offer a satisfaction guarantee: if you're not satisfied after the first two sessions, contact us for a partial refund or reschedule. Refunds after the second session are handled on a case-by-case basis.
terms.section3Content: Sessions must be scheduled in advance. Cancellations with less than 24 hours notice may result in forfeiture of payment. We will make reasonable efforts to reschedule when possible.
terms.section4Content: Students are expected to attend scheduled sessions on time, complete assigned practice, and maintain professional conduct. Required materials (cards, chips) must be purchased by the student.
terms.section5Content: While we provide job search guidance, we do not guarantee employment at any casino or gaming platform. Job placement depends on your skills, location, and market conditions.
terms.section6Content: All course materials, methods, and content are proprietary to LearnToDeal. Students may not record, reproduce, or distribute course content without written permission.
terms.section7Content: LearnToDeal is not liable for any indirect or consequential damages arising from use of our services. Our total liability is limited to the amount paid for services.
terms.section8Content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of new terms.
